short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visually modifies the Post Oak Schoology page to look and act more like Powerschool

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want it for firefox? Visit the website: https://powerology.aidencunningham.com/

Powerology is a browser extension designed to redesign the Post Oak Schoology page. It completely changes the home screen, as well as adds many extra features such as immediate links and grade summaries. Originally released to Firefox, version 6.0 brought full Chromium compatibility.
